Basketball Park

April 13, 2025 Tags: Sports
Start the game with 10 balls. Drag and release to shoot. Score without touching the rim to earn extra balls. Aim for high scores to unlock helpful creatures. Check the leaderboard to see how you compete with the top players. Special creatures might pop up to lend assistance as you hit score milestones, adding a fun and unpredictable twist.
